faq.question: How does SEO help my garage door business get more leads?
faq.answer: SEO helps your garage door business appear in front of people actively searching for services like repair or installation in your area. By ranking in local results and on Google Maps, you increase the chances of getting more service calls and inquiries.

faq.question: How long does it take to see SEO results for a garage door business?
faq.answer: Most garage door companies start seeing local ranking and traffic improvements within 2-3 months. More competitive areas may take 4-6 months for significant gains, especially in the Maps pack.

faq.question: Do you optimize for emergency garage door services?
faq.answer: Yes, we build and optimize dedicated emergency service pages to capture high-converting, time-sensitive searches like 'emergency garage door repair near me'.
